nodes.text: Tegett was a male X-wing pilot who served the New Republic as a captain by the time of the Black Fleet Crisis. He flew an X-wing starfighter with bright red markings and was stationed on the Mandjur. During the Battle of N'zoth, his fighter was used by Plat Mallar, who sacrificed himself by flying the X-wing into the path of a Yevethan ship attempting to ram the Mandjur.
